meanings.sent1: The antihuman robot refused to help the people.
meanings.sent2: Her antihuman behavior made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The cat's antihuman attitude towards the new baby was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The storm's antihuman rage shook the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The villain's antihuman plan aimed to destroy all human happiness.

meanings.definition: Showing hostility or aversion towards humans.
meanings.sent1: The antihuman protesters shouted angrily at the crowd.
meanings.sent2: His antihuman remarks were hurtful and unnecessary.
meanings.sent3: The antihuman dog barked loudly at anyone who came near.
meanings.sent4: The dark forest had an antihuman presence that sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence of the abandoned house felt antihuman and unsettling.
